fullText:
I can't quite shake the feeling in my brain of "what if o3 is more different than gemini 2.5 pro than most people think?" 

Gemini still going down the standard model -> reasoning -> API path?
OpenAI going down the reasoning + tools in app path? 
How do we test this?

Golden era!
